com.galou.moodtracker.controllers.activity

Class MainActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper

          • android.app.Activity

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, android.arch.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback, android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompat.RequestPermissionsRequestCodeValidator, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, android.support.v7.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v7.app.AppCompatCallback, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class MainActivity
extends BaseActivity
    Represents the Main Activity of the application

    A BaseActivity subclass The user can select a Mood by scrolling the pages of a VerticalViewPager. A temporary mood will be created with the user selection and added to the user MoodBank the next day.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    galou
    See Also:
    BaseActivity, Mood, VerticalViewPager, MoodBank

        See Also:

      • moodTemp

        private Mood moodTemp
        Temporary Mood choose by the user

        The mood is stored until the user choose another mood for the day or open the application on another day It inherits its property from the fragment displayed (color and drawable), today's date and the user comment

        See Also:
        addTmpMoodInBank(), getMoodBank(), Mood, smileyFromFragment, colorFromFragment, todayDate, userComment

      • PREF_FEY_FEELING_TMP

        See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • MainActivity

        public MainActivity()

    • Method Detail

      • addTmpMoodInBank

        private void addTmpMoodInBank()
        Add temporary mood to the user's MoodBank

        If the temporary mood date is different than today's date, the mood is added to the bank and the sharedPreferences are updated

        See Also:
        moodTemp, BaseActivity.moodBank, todayDate, Mood, MoodBank, saveMoodInPrefs()

      • configureViewPager

        private void configureViewPager()
        Configure the View Pager

      • set the adapter with the list of colors and list of drawable
      • set listener to the VerticalViewPager to know when a page is scrolled to get the actual fragment displayed
      • get the color and drawable from the fragment displayed to create the temporary mood with those data

See Also:
VerticalViewPager, PageAdapter, colorList, MOOD_DRAWABLE, smileyFromFragment, colorFromFragment

  • getMoodBank

    protected void getMoodBank()
    Get MoodBank from SharedPreferences

    Override method from BaseActivity to get the temporary Mood from the preferences as well. Add the temporary Mood to the bank

    Overrides:
    getMoodBank in class BaseActivity
    See Also:
    BaseActivity.getMoodBank(), BaseActivity.preferences, moodTemp, Mood, addTmpMoodInBank()

  • getTodayDate

    private void getTodayDate()
    Get today's date from Calendar Library
    See Also:
    Calendar, todayDate

  • onClickCommentButton

    public void onClickCommentButton(android.view.View view)
    Actions executed when the user click on the Comment Button

    A new Alert Dialog is started and allow the user to enter a comment The comment is stored as a String into the userComment variable and used to create the temporary mood

    Parameters:
    view - View on which the user has clicked
    See Also:
    userComment, moodTemp, Mood

  • onClickHistoryButton

    public void onClickHistoryButton(android.view.View view)
    Actions executed when the user click on the History Button

    A new HistoryActivity is started. The OnClick Listener is created with the ButterKnife Library.

    Parameters:
    view - View on which the user has clicked
    See Also:
    HistoryActivity

  • onCreate

    protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
    Actions executed when the Activity is created

  • set the layout of the activity
  • get today's date
  • get the user MoodBank and temporary mood saved in the SharedPreferences
  • configure the ViewPager

Overrides:
onCreate in class android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
Parameters:
savedInstanceState - saved state of the activity
See Also:
getTodayDate(), getMoodBank(), configureViewPager(), BaseActivity.moodBank, moodTemp, todayDate, MoodBank, Mood

  • onStop

    protected void onStop()
    Actions executed when the Activity is stopped

  • create a new moodTemp from the user selection
  • save MoodBank and moodTemp in the SharedPreferences

    • Overrides:
    onStop in class android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
    See Also:
    moodTemp, BaseActivity.preferences, Mood, saveMoodInPrefs()

    private void saveMoodInPrefs()
    Save MoodBank and temporary Mood in the SharedPreferences
    See Also:
    BaseActivity.preferences, BaseActivity.moodBank, moodTemp, Mood, MoodBank
